solution_line_template: The chef had {prepared_lunch_meals} - {sold_lunch_meals} = <<{prepared_lunch_meals}-{sold_lunch_meals}={remaining_lunch_meals}>>{remaining_lunch_meals} meals left after lunch.
So, the chef has {remaining_lunch_meals} + {prepared_dinner_meals} = <<{remaining_lunch_meals}+{prepared_dinner_meals}={total_dinner_meals}>>{total_dinner_meals} meals for dinner.
